page.title: 16CHILDS RECREATION
page.content: In Freshford there are various clubs for children. Every so often a Sports Van comes round,it has Archery,Gymnastics and lots of other sports . The Junior Drama group meets every Monday at 3:30pm till 5:15pm,it puts on shows for the public at Christmas and in the Summer . There is a tennis club,plus Cubs,Brownies,Guides and Scouts.Scouts meet every Wednesday,the others on Tuesday.Brownies and Guides meet in the Memorial Hall at different times,the Cubs and Scouts at Dingle Dale,a hut especially for them.
